list.title: Lumen5
list.desc: An AI-powered video creation platform that transforms text content into engaging videos.

list.title: Pictory
list.desc: Turn scripts into engaging videos using AI, with automatic scene selection and voiceovers.

list.title: Synthesia
list.desc: Create AI-generated videos using avatars that can speak in multiple languages.

list.title: Runway ML
list.desc: A creative suite that uses AI to help creators generate and edit videos with advanced tools.
